mn114:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn114:2.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn114:2.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
mn114:4.1: Evam vutte ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn114:4.2: “imassa kho aham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa, vittharena attham avibhattassa, evam vittharena attham ajanami.
mn114:5.6: Yatharupam, bhante, kayasamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupo kayasamacaro na sevitabbo;
mn114:5.7: yatharupanca kho, bhante, kayasamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, evarupo kayasamacaro sevitabbo.
mn114:5.8: Kathamrupam, bhante, kayasamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti?
mn114:5.9: Idha, bhante, ekacco panatipati hoti luddo lohitapani hatappahate nivittho adayapanno panabhutesu;
mn114:5.10: adinnadayi kho pana hoti, yam tam parassa paravittupakaranam gamagatam va arannagatam va tam adinnam theyyasankhatam adata hoti;
mn114:5.11: kamesumicchacari kho pana hoti, ya ta maturakkhita piturakkhita matapiturakkhita bhaturakkhita bhaginirakkhita natirakkhita gottarakkhita dhammarakkhita sassamika saparidanda antamaso malagulaparikkhittapi tatharupasu carittam apajjita hoti—
mn114:5.12: evarupam, bhante, kayasamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti.
mn114:5.13: Kathamrupam, bhante, kayasamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti?
mn114:5.14: Idha, bhante, ekacco panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato hoti nihitadando nihitasattho, lajji dayapanno sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharati;
mn114:5.15: adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirato hoti, yam tam parassa paravittupakaranam gamagatam va arannagatam va tam nadinnam theyyasankhatam adata hoti;
mn114:5.16: kamesumicchacaram pahaya kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, ya ta maturakkhita piturakkhita matapiturakkhita bhaturakkhita bhaginirakkhita natirakkhita gottarakkhita dhammarakkhita sassamika saparidanda antamaso malagulaparikkhittapi tatharupasu na carittam apajjita hoti—
mn114:5.17: evarupam, bhante, kayasamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti.
mn114:5.21: iti yam tam vuttam bhagavata idametam paticca vuttam.
mn114:6.6: Yatharupam, bhante, vacisamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupo vacisamacaro na sevitabbo;
mn114:6.7: yatharupanca kho, bhante, vacisamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti evarupo vacisamacaro sevitabbo.
mn114:6.8: Kathamrupam, bhante, vacisamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti?
mn114:6.9: Idha, bhante, ekacco musavadi hoti. Sabhagato va parisagato va natimajjhagato va pugamajjhagato va rajakulamajjhagato va abhinito sakkhiputtho: ‘ehambho purisa, yam janasi tam vadehi’ti so ajanam va aha: ‘janami’ti, janam va aha: ‘na janami’ti; apassam va aha: ‘passami’ti, passam va aha: ‘na passami’ti—iti attahetu va parahetu va amisakincikkhahetu va sampajanamusa bhasita hoti;
mn114:6.10: pisunavaco kho pana hoti, ito sutva amutra akkhata imesam bhedaya, amutra va sutva imesam akkhata amusam bhedaya—iti samagganam va bhetta, bhinnanam va anuppadata, vaggaramo, vaggarato, vagganandi, vaggakaranim vacam bhasita hoti;
mn114:6.11: pharusavaco kho pana hoti, ya sa vaca kandaka kakkasa pharusa parakatuka parabhisajjani kodhasamanta asamadhisamvattanika, tatharupim vacam bhasita hoti;
mn114:6.12: samphappalapi kho pana hoti akalavadi abhutavadi anatthavadi adhammavadi avinayavadi, anidhanavatim vacam bhasita hoti akalena anapadesam apariyantavatim anatthasamhitam—
mn114:6.13: evarupam, bhante, vacisamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti.
mn114:6.14: Kathamrupam, bhante, vacisamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti?
mn114:6.15: Idha, bhante, ekacco musavadam pahaya musavada pativirato hoti sabhagato va parisagato va natimajjhagato va pugamajjhagato va rajakulamajjhagato va abhinito sakkhiputtho: ‘ehambho purisa, yam janasi tam vadehi’ti so ajanam va aha: ‘na janami’ti, janam va aha: ‘janami’ti, apassam va aha: ‘na passami’ti, passam va aha: ‘passami’ti—iti attahetu va parahetu va amisakincikkhahetu va na sampajanamusa bhasita hoti;
mn114:6.16: pisunam vacam pahaya pisunaya vacaya pativirato hoti, ito sutva na amutra akkhata imesam bhedaya, amutra va sutva na imesam akkhata amusam bhedaya—iti bhinnanam va sandhata sahitanam va anuppadata samaggaramo samaggarato samagganandi samaggakaranim vacam bhasita hoti;
mn114:6.17: pharusam vacam pahaya pharusaya vacaya pativirato hoti, ya sa vaca nela kannasukha pemaniya hadayangama pori bahujanakanta bahujanamanapa tatharupim vacam bhasita hoti;
mn114:6.18: samphappalapam pahaya samphappalapa pativirato hoti kalavadi bhutavadi atthavadi dhammavadi vinayavadi, nidhanavatim vacam bhasita hoti kalena sapadesam pariyantavatim atthasamhitam—
mn114:6.19: evarupam, bhante, vacisamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti.
mn114:6.23: iti yam tam vuttam bhagavata idametam paticca vuttam.
mn114:7.6: Yatharupam, bhante, manosamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti evarupo manosamacaro na sevitabbo;
mn114:7.7: yatharupanca kho, bhante, manosamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti evarupo manosamacaro sevitabbo.
mn114:7.8: Kathamrupam, bhante, manosamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti?
mn114:7.9: Idha, bhante, ekacco abhijjhalu hoti, yam tam parassa paravittupakaranam tam abhijjhata hoti: ‘aho vata yam parassa tam mamassa’ti;
mn114:7.10: byapannacitto kho pana hoti padutthamanasankappo: ‘ime satta hannantu va vajjhantu va ucchijjantu va vinassantu va ma va ahesun’ti—
mn114:7.11: evarupam, bhante, manosamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti.
mn114:7.12: Kathamrupam, bhante, manosamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti?
mn114:7.13: Idha, bhante, ekacco anabhijjhalu hoti, yam tam parassa paravittupakaranam tam nabhijjhata hoti: ‘aho vata yam parassa tam mamassa’ti;
mn114:7.14: abyapannacitto kho pana hoti appadutthamanasankappo: ‘ime satta avera abyabajjha anigha sukhi attanam pariharantu’ti—
mn114:7.15: evarupam, bhante, manosamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti.
mn114:7.19: iti yam tam vuttam bhagavata idametam paticca vuttam.

mn114:10.6: Yatharupam, bhante, ditthipatilabham sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti evarupo ditthipatilabho na sevitabbo;
mn114:10.7: yatharupanca kho, bhante, ditthipatilabham sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti—evarupo ditthipatilabho sevitabbo.
mn114:10.8: Kathamrupam, bhante, ditthipatilabham sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti?
mn114:10.10: ‘natthi dinnam, natthi yittham, natthi hutam, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, natthi ayam loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mata, natthi pita, natthi satta opapatika, natthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti—
